trans-unit.source: Specifies the placement of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref> with respect to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o posicionamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"> </xref> com relação ao <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The TickBarPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: A enumeração TickBarPlacement é usada para definir a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The actual position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: A posição atual de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>é definido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property identifies this position so that the ticks of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> are drawn correctly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>propriedade identifica nesta posição para que as marcas de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>são desenhados corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> controls are drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property is set to Top and Bottom.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>controles são desenhados quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>propriedade for definida como superior e inferior.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada abaixo o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada à esquerda do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala está posicionada à direita do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A barra de escala é posicionada acima de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>.
